======Sets tesla trap ammo.======

= Description =

Controls tesla trap ammo (number of shocks before self-destructing). This value is ignored if <!--[asw_tesla_trap_infinite_ammo]-->[[asw_tesla_trap_infinite_ammo.wiki|asw_tesla_trap_infinite_ammo]] is enabled.
